Matamanoa Island Resort Matamanoa Island is a small 22 acre, boutique, private resort located in the Mamanuca Islands of Fiji. This tranquil Island Paradise caters to couples from around the globe in either air-conditioned thatched Resort Room, Beachfront Bures or Beachfront Villas.
